author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Red Rocks sets attendance record in 2023 season
text:
Summary by Ground News More than 1.65 million tickets were sold at Red Rocks in 2023, the city of Denver says. This makes it one of the five busiest venues in the world, according to a list put together by Billboard Magazine. The list has London's O2 Arena at the top, followed by Mexico City's Foro Sol stadium. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
KDVR Center High Factuality Media Conglomerate: Nexstar Media Group Media Conglomerate: Tribune Media Red Rocks sets attendance record in 2023 season DENVER (KDVR) -- If you like live music and live in Colorado, chances are high that you've been to at least one show at Red Rocks. New numbers released by the city of Denver show just how much of a draw the iconic amphitheater is. Between concerts, films and other events held at the venue, more than 1.65 million tickets were sold in 2023. author: Patrick Austen-Hardy
title: Manny Pacquiao announces he'll face Floyd Mayweather in 'big fight' in 2024 - Daily Star
text: Manny Pacquiao announced he will fight Floyd Mayweather again - eight years after their 'Fight of the Century' clash. The Pac-Man has been teasing a return to the squared circle for many years. Conor McGregor recently claimed he and Pacquiao were being touted for a match in Saudi Arabia, when the Irishman was set next to Cristiano Ronaldo for the 'Day of Reckoning' fight card. However, Pacquiao, 45, appears confident he will be fighting his former nemesis in a monumental clash in Japan. After the Filipino boxing legend, who retired in 2021 with an extraordinary record of 62 wins and eight losses, made his announcement, the world of combat sports became excited. READ MORE: Five boxing New Year's resolutions including Conor Benn and Chris Eubank Jr hope READ MORE: Deontay Wilder 'had a problem' before Joseph Parker defeat which ruined AJ fight Pacquiao said: ‚ÄúI will see you here in Japan again, for a big fight with Floyd Mayweather." After turning round and appearing to ask the announcer for permission to announce it, he said: ‚ÄúFloyd Mayweather, I thought you wouldn‚Äôt want me to say that. ‚ÄúI am excited for that. Thank you for always supporting ‚ÄòRIZIN‚Äô promotions.‚Äù Mayweather is yet to respond to Pacquiao's announcement. Do you want to see Floyd Mayweather fight Manny Pacquiao again? Let us know in the comment section below The boxing legend, who retired in 2017 with a flawless 50-0 record, has been fighting in numerous exhibition bouts since he retired. As well as taking on YouTubers such as Logan Paul and Deji Olatunji, he also fought Japanese kick-boxer Tenshin Nasukawa during another exhibition bout in Japan in 2019. It's currently unclear when Pacquiao thinks they will be able to have their rematch. In November, Mayweather announced he would be fighting John Gotti III for a second time, but is yet to clarify any finer details including the date or the location. It is not the first time Pacquiao has said he will fight Mayweather in Japan. In October, he said he would be taking on the Michigan native just before Christmas . He said: ‚ÄúI have an exhibition match coming in December in Japan,‚Äù said Manny Pacquiao in media reports. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre working on the opponent. We‚Äôre working with Mayweather. Yes,‚Äù

author: /autor/el-nuevo-dia/
title: Bomberos reciben un aumento salarial de $375 - El Nuevo D√≠a
text: El secretario del [Departamento de Seguridad P√∫blica (DSP)](https://www.elnuevodia.com/topicos/departamento-de-seguridad-publica/), [Alexis Torres](https://www.elnuevodia.com/topicos/alexis-torres/) y el comisionado del Negociado del [Cuerpo de Bomberos (NCBPR)](https://www.elnuevodia.com/topicos/bomberos-de-puerto-rico/), [Marcos Concepci√≥n Tirado](https://www.elnuevodia.com/noticias/gobierno/notas/el-gobernador-designa-a-marcos-concepcion-como-comisionado-de-bomberos-en-propiedad/), anunciaron que los bomberos recibieron un aumento de $375. El alza salarial surge luego que el gobernador [Pedro Pierluisi](https://www.elnuevodia.com/topicos/pedro-pierluisi/) firmara la Ley Especial de Salario Base para los Bomberos y que la [Junta de Supervisi√≥n Fiscal](https://www.elnuevodia.com/topicos/junta-de-supervision-fiscal/) lo autorizara. Con este aumento, el salario base de los bomberos se eleva a $2,500. El secretario del DSP inform√≥ que la inversi√≥n de este pago, que se hizo retroactivo, fue de $3,217,976 y destac√≥ que este es el cuarto aumento salarial que el gobernador Pierluisi otorga a los bomberos en este cuatrienio. En tanto, Pierluisi dijo que ‚Äúla labor de nuestros bomberos es indispensable para salvaguardar la vida y propiedad de nuestros ciudadanos. Son primeros respondedores que demuestran su compromiso con Puerto Rico, cumpliendo con su deber sin importar los riesgos‚Äù. El gobernador a√±adi√≥ que durante su administraci√≥n se ha asegurado de ‚Äúcumplir con la justicia salarial que les promet√≠ y me comprometo a continuar identificando recursos para que tengan todas las herramientas que necesitan para seguir realizando su trabajo eficientemente‚Äù. De otro lado, Torres inform√≥ que los 46 empleados civiles del NCBPR recibir√°n el pago el pr√≥ximo 15 de enero de 2024, para una inversi√≥n de $83,790. Destac√≥ que durante este cuatrienio se han reclutado unos 450 bomberos y, en marzo de 2024, inicio de una nueva academia, que sumar√≠a 300 adicionales. Por su parte, Concepci√≥n Tirado dijo que este aumento se suma a la entrega de camiones de extinci√≥n, de cisterna y de mantenimiento, as√≠ como veh√≠culos forestales y equipo tecnol√≥gico para los inspectores de prevenci√≥n de incendios, bunkers, generadores el√©ctricos, mangas de 1¬Ω y 2¬Ω, radios bases y port√°tiles para comunicaci√≥n, entre otros equipos necesarios para los bomberos. Finalmente, plante√≥ que ‚Äúhoy puedo decir que cada uno de los reclamos de los compa√±eros ha sido atendido con diligencia. Hoy los bomberos reciben un aumento sin precedentes, merecido y justo‚Äù. [üí¨Ver comentarios] - ‚éô

author: @Patheos
title: Introductory Pages of the Book of Mormon Part 1 ‚Ä¢ Dr. Casey Griffiths & Dr. Scott Woodward ‚Ä¢ Jan 1 - Jan 7
text: How often do we hold a miracle in our hands? Dr. Casey Griffiths and Dr. Scott Woodward open doors to understanding one of the most influential texts in history. They explore the Introduction of the Book of Mormon, the witnesses to the golden plates, and the promises made through studying this miraculous book. Show Notes (English, French, Spanish, Portuguese): https://followhim.co/book-of-mormon-episodes-1-13/ Apple Podcasts: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/follow-him-a-come-follow-me-podcast/id1545433056 YouTube: https://youtu.be/zeajSoxrFW8 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/followhimpodcast Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/15G9TTz8yLp0dQyEcBQ8BY Please rate and review the podcast! 00:00 Part 1‚ÄìDr. Casey Griffiths and Dr. Scott Woodward 03:33 Introduction of guests 04:12 Why study Church History 07:22 Church History Matters Podcast 09:02 Introductory pages of the Book of Mormon 12:10 Miracles have not ceased 17:09 Jesus Christ is the focus of the Book of Mormon 19:13 Three-fold purpose of the Book of Mormon 20:54 Purpose as speaker system 25:05 The covenant consciousness 27:39 Jesus Christ is for the entire world 31:23 The purpose and function of the Book of Mormon 33:38 Moroni and the errors of men 36:41 Dr. Woodward shares an experience reviewing online 40:36 Testimonies of the eleven men and one woman 45:23 Never deny their testimonies 48:20 Martin Harris 50:16 David Whitmer 58:38 President Dallin Harris Oaks on Martin Harris 1:01:12 End of Part I‚ÄìDr. Casey Griffiths and Dr. Scott Woodward Thanks to the followHIM team: Shannon Sorensen: Cofounder, Executive Producer, Sponsor David & Verla Sorensen: Sponsors Dr. Hank Smith: Co-host John Bytheway: Co-host David Perry: Producer Kyle Nelson: Marketing, Sponsor Lisa Spice: Client Relations, Editor, Show Notes Jamie Neilson: Social Media, Graphic Design Annabelle Sorensen: Creative Project Manager Will Stoughton: Video Editor Krystal Roberts: Translation Team, English & French Transcripts, Website Ariel Cuadra: Spanish Transcripts "Let Zion in Her Beauty Rise" by Marshall McDonald https://www.marshallmcdonaldmusic.com

author: Redacci√≥n
title: Las tormentas en Santa Fe, Corrientes y Entre R√≠os causaron duros destrozos
text: Durante la noche del jueves y la madrugada del viernes, intensas tormentas con r√°fagas de hasta 105 km/h causaron destrozos en las provincias de Santa Fe, Corrientes y Entre R√≠os. En Santa Fe, localidades como Sunchales, Ceres, San Crist√≥bal, Hersilia, Elisa, Reconquista y Avellaneda fueron las m√°s afectadas, experimentando ca√≠das masivas de √°rboles y cortes de energ√≠a por la ca√≠da de postes el√©ctricos. Los residentes vivieron momentos de incertidumbre y las im√°genes revelaron casas sin techo, √°rboles dispersos y estructuras desaparecidas. El Servicio Meteorol√≥gico Nacional (SMN) anunci√≥ que el mal tiempo cesar√° durante el d√≠a, con la salida del sol y una temperatura m√°xima de 33 grados. Corrientes tambi√©n sufri√≥ da√±os considerables debido a un frente de mal clima, con ciudades afectadas por r√°fagas superiores a 100 km/h, generando escenarios similares a los de Santa Fe. Se esperan tormentas y lluvias durante el resto del d√≠a, despej√°ndose hacia el inicio del s√°bado. En Entre R√≠os, el temporal dej√≥ graves da√±os, con √°rboles ca√≠dos sobre viviendas y la entrada de agua en algunas casas. En Bella Vista, las r√°fagas causaron la rotura de una estatua en una plaza. Las condiciones adversas persistir√°n durante el viernes, mejorando reci√©n el s√°bado despu√©s del mediod√≠a, con una m√°xima de 31 grados. El alerta naranja se mantiene para el norte del pa√≠s, incluyendo Jujuy, Tucum√°n, Salta, norte de Corrientes y sur de Misiones. Asimismo, hay alerta amarilla para el norte de Misiones, Corrientes, Chaco, Formosa, norte de Santa Fe y Santiago del Estero

author: KickOff Reporter
title: Arsenal suffer first home defeat of the season | KickOff
text: Arsenal suffered a first home defeat of the Premier League campaign after going down 2-0 to London rivals West Ham United on Thursday night. Leandro Trossard was recalled to the Gunners' line-up after the 1-1 draw with Liverpool over the weekend, as Kai Havertz was suspended for an accumulation of yellow cards. The Hammers made the perfect start after Tomas Soucek sent a first-time finish beyond David Raya after Jarrod Bowen managed to keep the ball in by a small in margin in the build. Mikel Arteta's charges remained in control despite going behind but they were finding it tough to break a stubborn Hammers defence, who were happy to soak up the pressure. The Gunners went agonisingly close to find the leveller a few minutes before the interval as Martin Odegaard's intricate pass sent Bukayo Saka through on goal, but the England international's was kept out by the post. Arsenal were made to rue that miss as the Hammers doubled their lead ten minutes after the halftime break, with Konstantinos Mavropanos nodding home from a corner against his former side. The hosts went close to pulling one back with 25 minutes when Gabriel Jesus got on the end of Saka's in-swinging cross, but saw his header saved by goalkeeper Alphonse Areola. West Ham were afforded the chance to pile more misery on Arsenal in time added on after being awarded a penalty for Rice's foul, but Said Benrahma was denied by a good save from Raya. Two goals were enough to hand Moyes' side maximum points on the day while also denying the Gunners a chance to move top of the Premier League table.
